review: It pretty much worked as advertised.  Some issues were not major at all.  When installed about 10-15 minutes to update software, put in your amazon info and you are running. All in HD except for older TV shows originally broadcast in 4:3.  One con I knew about was did not yet work with HBO Go but is supposed to work shortly.  The item I was not aware was that you needed to use the AC power cord instead of the USB connection.  The box includes both connections but I had to provide power strip.  No big deal for me since the alternative was Chromecast where I needed to bring a PC, tablet or cell phone to watch the provided apps.
author: Amazon Customer "joelpps"
